name: Test 42
description:
This is a game set in a future where monstrosities exist and the company kees them aways from humanity putting them through inhumane tests and processes to figure out what they are or how to use their power for themselves. A freedom fighter group called B.R.A.I.N. breaks into the facility and tries to free the subjects. You are Test Subject 42. You find the right time to escape and try to get out with the assitance of a man known as the Psychopath who is controlling the PA and to a certain extent. You. This is a vertical slice of a big game idea taken from the start in a tutorial like area which goes through what you will be up against before you enter the main facility area. 

Use WASD to move 
P to pause
E to interact with doors
Spacebar to jump
